Body: When I vistit on my nexus one the website alternativeto.net and open a subpage then suddenly I see a fullscreen ad with the title "liferay.com" and the address cat.m.ifortune.mobivillage.deI see the desktop version of alternativeto.net when I visit themIs it a problem of alternativeto.net or is there some virus on my smartphone?It doesnt happen on other websites while surfing with my smartphoneif it is not android related, please move it to the right board (didnt know if i should post it in superusers?)
Title: Got weird fullscreen ad when visiting website

history.Text: When I vistit on my nexus one the website alternativeto.net and open a subpage then suddenly I see a fullscreen ad with the title "liferay.com" and the address cat.m.ifortune.mobivillage.deI see the desktop version of alternativeto.net when I visit themIs it a problem of alternativeto.net or is there some virus on my smartphone?It doesnt happen on other websites while surfing with my smartphone**if it is not android related, please move it to the right board (didnt know if i should post it in superusers?)**
